title: 领地上限问题
txt_content:
玩自己开的服务器，领地只可以圈3个  大小好像不能超过 300 怎么设置领地个数上限和大小上限？？？？？


求解~~~~~~~~~~

replies.author: 大兴
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 大兴 于 2013-5-25 10:50 编辑 

记事本格式打开\plugins\Residence\config.yml
Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.（领地数量设置） 
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).（经度宽度设置）

           MaxEastWest: 16
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).（纬度宽度设置）
           MaxNorthSouth: 16
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).（高度设置）
           MaxUpDown: 256
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.（最低高度设置）
           MinHeight: 0
           # The highest altitude this group is allowed to protect.（最高高度设置）
           MaxHeight: 255
            # The maximum recursive depth that subzones can go.
            # A subzone within a subzone within the Residence zone would be a depth of 2.
            # Set to 0 to disable subzones.
